error.internetConnection: You have bad Internet connection. Please wait for the process to finish and connection is restored.
error.offline: ERROR: You are offline. Please try again in a while!
error.phoneError: Error: This phone cannot be verified
error.wrongNumber: Error: The phone number is wrong
error.whatsapp: Error opening WhatsApp link. Please email support@hellonimbly.com.
error.requiredEmailOrPhone: Please input a phone number or email
error.invalidPhone: Error: Phone number are not registered!
error.invalidEmail: Error: ¡La dirección de correo electrónico no está registrada!
error.otpMaxAttempt: You have exceeded maximum number of OTP requests attempts. Please try again later

success: Password reset request successful! Please check your email.

twoFactor.enterCode:
Enter the verification code sent to 
{{phoneNumber}}
twoFactor.emailSent:
We have sent you a verification link via your email

If you cannot find the email in your inbox, please check your spam folder.

form.enterEmailPhone:
Enter your registered
work email or phone number
to verify your account.
form.sendARequest: Envíe una solicitud para restablecer su contraseña

form.checkEmail: Por favor revise su correo electrónico para continuar...
form.loginInstruction2: • Enter your phone number in international format e.g +628 1200 0000

validation.invalidEmail: Introduzca un correo electrónico con el formato de correo electrónico correcto.
validation.existEmail: Error: Correo electrónico ya en uso
validation.weakPassword: Error: Password is too weak, please try again
validation.errorAuth: Ingresó una dirección de correo electrónico o contraseña incorrecta. Inténtalo de nuevo.
validation.askPermision: You need permission to log in. To request access to your Account Holder, click the button below.
validation.askPermisionNimbly: Su cuenta aún no ha sido registrada en nuestro sistema. Envíe su solicitud de acceso al titular de su cuenta.
validation.timeout: Error: The network timed out. Please try again in a while!
validation.tooManyRequest: Error: Unusual activity detected. Please try again in a few minutes.
validation.defaultValidation:
An unknown error has occured.
Please contact support.
validation.needPassword: Password is required to link the account.

toastRequestSuccess.title: Access Requested!
toastRequestSuccess.body: Your request has been sent to your Account Holder

setPassword.validationInstruction: Password must be at least 6 characters long and contain at least 1 letter and 1 number. Password is case sensitive.
setPassword.setPasswordSuccess:
Password has been set.

You will be automatically redirected to the login screen in {{countDown}}s.
setPassword.linkExpired: Tautan verifikasi telah kedaluwarsa atau telah digunakan. Klik Batal dan aktifkan kembali akun Anda.
